    • Method Detail

      • sendSelectedItem

        public void sendSelectedItem​(Product product)
        This method passes the selected selected item from the main screen passes the selected item information to there appropriate text field and populates the associated table view. Here we also remove the associated parts from the allparts list. This was my solution to prevent users from adding duplicate.
        Parameters:
        product - sends selected item data

      • OnActionSearch

        private void OnActionSearch​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Search functionality for Modify Product Form this methods performs a search for the top tableview. similar to the Mainscreen method.
        Parameters:
        event - event for when the search button is clicked which should perform this method

      • OnActionAdd

        private void OnActionAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method adds the selected part from the the allPartsTable to the associatedPartsTable
        Parameters:
        event - event for when the Add button is clicked which should perform this method

      • OnActionCancel

        private void OnActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This method cancels the form from save and send the user back to the Main Screen.
        Parameters:
        event - event for when the cancel button is clicked which should perform this method
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for transition to new scene

      • OnActionRemoveAssociated

        private void OnActionRemoveAssociated​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method removes the Associated part from the bottom table view and removes from the associatedList This function slightly different from the add products controller. this was because of a logical error causing items to still delete even if the user would cancel modification. my solution to this was to create a temporary ObservableList that will hold deleted items until item is saved.
        Parameters:
        event - event for when the remove associated parts button is clicked it should perform this method.

      • OnActionSave

        private void OnActionSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method adds the populated form the the products list This method updates the item and sends the user back to the mainscreen. this performs a similar validation from what is on addproductform. We also loop through the temporary associatedpartsList to add the items into the ObservableList inside the products model.
        Parameters:
        event - event for when the save button is clicked it should perform this method.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes the allpartstable boths table columns from the allpartsTable and the associatedPartsTable are initialized here. allpartsList is set here and set in the allPartsTable.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - url is used for resolving the path for the root object
        resourceBundle - rb is used to localize the root object
